thread.title: 24 Clever Little Products That'll Keep Your Hands Busy
thread.title_full: 24 Clever Little Products That'll Keep Your Hands Busy

author: Jeff Barron
title: 24 Clever Little Products That'll Keep Your Hands Busy
text:
View this image › 
Charlotte Gomez / BuzzFeed We hope you love the products we recommend! Just so you know, BuzzFeed may collect a share of sales from the links on this page. 
ID: 10722117 1. A cute edamame keychain that you can pop out over and over again. View this image › 
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $12 .
ID: 10710078 2. A small discrete bike chain to slide around smoothly. View this image › 
amazon.com Get one from Amazon for $11 .
ID: 10708185 3. A magnetic modular pen that can be broken down to make ~art~. amazon.com Get one from Amazon for $18 .
ID: 10708224 4. Exquisitely machined Begleri beads you can twirl and flip around your fingers. View this image › 
jllawsonco.com Get them from J. L. Lawson & Co. for $55 .
ID: 10708191 5. A spinner that seems more geared toward you. View this image › 
amazon.com Get one from Amazon for $30 .
ID: 10708237 6. Or if something less subtle is your thing, a gyroscope-y spinner . View this image › 
amazon.com Get one from Amazon for $15 .
ID: 10708909 7. A bendable pen with a million different fidget-y functions on it. indiegogo.com Get one from their campaign on IndieGogo for $44 .
ID: 10708304 8. A finger-sized chain toy to roll around and bend into different shapes. amazon.com Get one from Amazon from $11 .
ID: 10708492 9. A Jeliku for folding into different shapes and structures. View this image › 
amazon.com Get one from Amazon for $6 .
ID: 10708541 10. A container of kinetic sand to keep on your desk to give your hands a borderline erotic experience. View this image › 
share.gifyoutube.com Get one from Amazon for $13 .
ID: 10709718 11. A folding, looping, twisting brainteaser of a hinge toy . View this image › 
amazon.com Get one from Amazon for $14 .
ID: 10708544 12. A set of pencils with various screws to fiddle with. View this image › 
amazon.com Get a set from Amazon for $6 .
ID: 10708552 13. Tiny, lightweight chain links you can easily fit in your pocket. View this image › 
amazon.com Get one from Amazon for $5 .
ID: 10709947 14. A set of tangle-y toys that you won’t be able to put down. View this image › 
amazon.com Get a set of three from Amazon for $10 .
ID: 10708567 15. A zen-like Etch-a-Sketch that uses only water to calm your mind. View this image › 
amazon.com Get one from Amazon for $29 .
ID: 10709759 16. A durable doll designed to handle all your stress. View this image › 
amazon.com Get one from Amazon for $13 .
ID: 10709826 17. A tiny sand garden to make patterns with on your desk. View this image › 
amazon.com Get one from Amazon for $22 .
ID: 10709773 18. A spinning gyroscope to build up wrist strength and occupy your hands. Jeff Barron / BuzzFeed / Via buzzfeed.com Get one from Amazon for $22 .
I also did a little write-up about it here .
ID: 10709882 19. A small shift lever that actually shifts. View this image › 
amazon.com Get one from Amazon for $8 .
ID: 10709999 20. An enmeshed marble you can push around in your pocket. View this image › 
amazon.com Get a pack of eight on Amazon for $10 .
ID: 10710003 21. An infinite bubble wrap keychain to pop away your stress. View this image › 
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $13 .
ID: 10710089 22. Baoding balls that can help improve your hand dexterity. View this image › 
Anastasia / Amazon / Via amzn.to Get a set from Amazon for $8 .
ID: 10711803 23. A Rubik’s cube to learn how to solve while working your mind and your hands. View this image › 
amazon.com Get one from Amazon for $18 .
ID: 10711800 24. And a two-tone ring with a center ring that spins separately. Amazon Customer / Via amzn.to , J.P. / Via amzn.to Get one from Amazon for $0.99 .
ID: 10711806 Want even more great product suggestions? Sign up for BuzzFeed’s Gift Guide Newsletter! 



View this embed ›
